title: Lighter chicken, bacon and leek pies
description: This chicken pie is easy to make and still feels like a proper pie - even though it's lower in calories. Serve with steamed veg, it's so filling you don't need anything else.For this recipe you will need two individual pie dishes (about 400ml/14fl oz).Each serving provides 344kcal, 41g protein, 12g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars), 14g fat (of which 6g saturates), 3g fibre and 1.5g salt.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz semi-skimmed milk, plus a ½ tbsp extra to glaze
100g/3½oz reduced-calorie ready rolled puff pastry (about a 10x25cm piece)
2 bacon medallions, sliced into small pieces
200g/7oz button mushrooms, large ones cut in half
